sentences.sContent: At the Sheffield arena, the speakers were magnified ten times on a giant screen.
sentences.sCn: 在谢菲尔德体育馆，演讲者在一个巨大的屏幕上被放大了十倍。

sentences.sContent: A public address system magnifies all the little noises and coughs.
sentences.sCn: 扩音系统会放大任何细小的噪音和咳嗽声。

sentences.sContent: The report tends to magnify the risks involved
sentences.sCn: 这份报告有夸大所涉风险的倾向。
